name: Floor Is Lava (ChromeCreep)
description:
Made for MashUp Game Jam 2
You're in a platformer but you can't... walk? Try and navigate these levels with your Airborne skills alone!

Controls:

Use "A" and "D" for air movement.

Use "SPACE" for wall-jumping.

Use "E" or the left mouse button to grapple.

(You must have the target in your line of sight to grab)

Use "W" and "S" to rappel up and down.

Press "ESCAPE" to pause.

Press "R" to restart. 

Thank you for playing!
